General.Name: Sentelic Corp
General.Description: Sentelic Corporation operates as an IC design company in Taiwan, China, and Japan. It offers mixed-signal, ASIC, firmware/software, and multi-media processing services; fan motor drive control IC's for servers, communication equipment, cloud data centers, and 5G base stations; and cooling fans for servers, telecommunication switching equipment, gaming graphics cards, and mining hardware. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Taipei, Taiwan. As of August 17, 2022, Sentelic Corporation operates as a subsidiary of Weltrend Semiconductor, Inc..
